page.title: 14Little Heath JMI School
page.content: The school began as a parochial Church school in November 1884. It was financed by the Shepherd brothers from Leggatts Park and started in the Mission Room on the present site of Christ Church. The population grew rapidly then as the large houses of Little Heath expanded their number of "service" employees. Some families can be traced right through the school's history and have helped to give it character and identity. Music is very strong in the school with guitars, recorders, choir and orchestra flourishing. There is a wide range of extra_curricular activities and a strong P.T.A.
